events.name: IoTBlock- The Universal IoT Blockchain Database
events.description: IoTBlock was started to bring governance and oversight of health, safety, functional integrity, and real-time industry certification status of every IoT devices, through creation of a governing public private consortium and The Universal Blockchain Database, a universal blockchain database for IoT and their users. Our founding team includes talent from MIT, Berkeley, Stanford, ex-Google and Kodak is working with existing and next-generation RFID technology, IoTBlock will build the world’s first, decentralized Blockchain Hypercat compatible IoT device governance platform featuring an Universal IoT Blockchain Database and Hypercat REST API that interacts directly with Ethereum blockchain. Please check out the project at https://iotblock.io Speaker:Denis Lam - CEO & Chief Strategist UC Berkeley School of Engineering, Full Stack Developer, Angel Investor, Serial Entrepreneur, Futurist, Managing partner of Infinity Group Venture Capital Denis speaks 3 languages and has 10 years experience working with multimillion dollar ventures in Asia and North America as a brand and marketing consultant, advisor, technologist, and product engineer. As a serial entrepreneur, he has built and managed sales and marketing teams of thousands of individuals who work asynchronously across multiple time zones. He is currently an advisor for various Blockchain projects. With his experience in full stack web development, building effective online marketing campaigns, grassroots community organizing, and understanding of the Blockchain ecosystem, Denis brings a wealth of cross-disciplinary experience to IoTBlock. Agenda:6-6.30pm - Reception[masked]pm - Presentation and Q&A7.30-8pm - Networking

events.name: Global Inclusive Blockchain Conference 2018
events.description: Hey Likers, The Singapore University of Social Sciences (SUSS) and Longhash will be organising the Global Inclusive Blockchain Conference for 2-days sharing on April 17-18, 2018. This bilingual Conference will discuss topics from macroeconomics, finance & investment, regulation, standards & applications, to technical matters related to Blockchain. Please register at their eventbrite link:https://www.eventbrite.sg/e/global-inclusive-blockchain-conference-2018-at-the-singapore-university-of-social-sciences-april-registration-44280533267?aff=es2 *Updated Event Programme:https://sussblockchain.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Schedule-%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A0%E5%9D%A1%E5%B3%B0%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%AE%E7%A8%8B0415.pdf We are at the cusp of an industrial revolution and through this Conference, we aim to engage you in debates and discussions with leading practitioners and thought leaders as well as to present you with the opportunity to advance Blockchain knowledge and its applications. Keynote speakers at the Conference will include Dr Xiao Feng, Chairman and CEO of Shanghai Wanxiang Blockchain Inc., Mr James Gong, CEO of ChainB – China’s leading blockchain publication, and Mr Patrick Dai, Founder of QTUM Foundation. For more information, please visit:bit.ly/sussgibc2018
events.group_name: All Who Like Cryptocurrency and Blockchain

events.name: Demonstration of the world's first collision-tolerant drone
events.description:
Reduce risk, save time, increase profits!
 Do you want to improve your profits, drastically cut survey time and reduce risks to your people? If you do, you can't afford to ignore this!
Join Martek Marine on Tuesday 17th April 2018 in Singapore as we provide a working demonstration of the world's first collision-tolerant drone. See and hear how the collision-tolerant drone can revolutionise confined space inspections at a time when risks need to be as low as reasonably practicable. 
Attendance is free of charge, but places are limited.
events.location: Martek Marine, Changi Room, Level 8 Samsung Hub, Singapore null
